description.name: Meta’s BlenderBot 3 Chatbot Demo Made Offensive Antisemitic Comments
description.value: The publicly launched conversational AI demo BlenderBot 3 developed by Meta was reported by its users and acknowledged by its developers to have “occasionally” made offensive and inconsistent remarks such as invoking Jewish stereotypes.

references.label: Incident 278: Meta’s BlenderBot 3 Chatbot Demo Made Offensive Antisemitic Comments
